name: Ascend Aviation
about: Ascend Pilot Academy, in partnership with Hillsboro Aero Academy, offers a comprehensive and financially accessible path to becoming a commercial pilot. Located in Hillsboro and Redmond, Oregon, the academy provides a full-time flight training program that can be completed in 13-18 months. Students are eligible for financial aid and a stipend up to $27,000 upon signing with Horizon Air. The program includes mentorship, guidance, and networking opportunities, as well as funding for the Certified Flight Instructor Instrument (CFII) rating. With a strong commitment to safety and rigorous training, Ascend Pilot Academy prepares students for careers with Horizon Air and eventual transition to Alaska Airlines through the Pathways program. Apply now to embark on your professional pilot career.
